post.text: Could you imagine if I went 241 days without a press conference!? Crooked Hillary Clinton- concludes her 241st day without having a press conference- while running for President of the United States of America!? Absolutely no transparency & communication with the American people!

comment.author: Danielle
comment.text: So when is the first 'ahem' Debate? LOL, it will be a total disaster for Hillary..

replies.author: Devin
replies.text: Hillary is going to destroy Trump in the debates. He won't be reading off of a script, and can't put a coherent thought together.

replies.author: Danielle
replies.text: Devin bwahahaha.. you keep thinking that.. it just proves that hillary followers are as stupid as she is.
